TextView.android:text: There are 65 calories in 1 regular slice of Multigrain Bread.Calorie breakdown: 13% fat, 71% carbs, 15% protein.A 1-slice serving of multi-grain bread contains 69 calories. One slice accounts for 3.4 percent of the calories you should consume daily if you follow a 2,000 calorie diet, but two slices -- the amount you commonly eat in a sandwich -- represents roughly 7 percent of your total calories. Speak to a nutritionist or your physician about how many calories you should consume to meet your nutritional goals.
